amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title) insert the following: None of the funds in this Act may be used for the National Endowment for the Arts.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to eliminate funding for the National Endowment for the Arts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lamborn amendment (A057) Failed by recorded vote: 97 - 335 (Roll no. 575).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A057) offered by Mr. Lamborn.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lamborn amendment (A057) Failed by recorded vote: 97 - 335 (Roll no. 575).
